name: 24/7 TALK Line, Parental Stress Support Line
description: Safe & Sound has a 24-hours hotline that offers support to parents and caregivers of children under the age of 18 years in the Bay area. Volunteers are available daily to talk through life challenges and parenting issues.
fullDescription: Safe & Sound has a 24-hours hotline that offers support to parents and caregivers of children under the age of 18 years in the Bay area. Volunteers are available daily to talk through life challenges and parenting issues.
whatTheyOffer: Safe & Sound has a 24-hours hotline that offers support to parents and caregivers of children under the age of 18 years in the Bay area. Volunteers are available daily to talk through life challenges and parenting issues and possible child abuse. How to Apply: - Call 415-441-KIDS (5437). Open Hours: - 24 hours daily Service Contact Information: - Phone number: 415-441-5437 - Email: info@safeandsound.org
